title: Ryan Adams - Rough & Mellow (1994-2014) - Live Collection
description:
Ryan Adams
Rough & Mellow (1994-2014)

A collection of live recordings of unreleased original songs by Ryan Adams, of which no demo or studio recordings are avaiable.
A lot of these were only played or recorded once, if not I picked the one that sounded best to me. Edits made with Audacity.

This an updated final version of my compilation. The Cardinal Jams (originally Discs 7-8) have been removed and are now included in the "Sing You A Song" Jam & Improv Collection (updated 6 CD final version coming soon). Although "Petal In A Rainstorm" was released by now, I found it to be too pretty to be taken out. I included "Testy, Testy" and "21st Century Wars", since unlike the available demos the live versions have lyrics.

While working on the FLAC version of this (you can find it here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11249819/Ryan_Adams_-_Rough__amp__Mellow_(1994-2014)_Live_Collect._FLAC) I upgraded and fixed a couple of songs, so I had to update the mp3 version I posted a couple of months ago one final time. I also corrected the date on Lord, Tell Me How It's Gonna Be and added The Door, for which I had to move things around a bit. This is the last version of this collection.

Thanks a lot to all the people that taped, transferred and shared these recordings over the years. Thanks for all your efforts. This collection would have been also impossible to realize without www.answeringbell.archiveasylum.com, www.ryanadamsarchive.com &And thanks most of all to Ryan Adams for allowing the taping and sharing.

Enjoy
